cmcTcMibMajRev.name: cmcTcMibMajRev
cmcTcMibMajRev.description: The Major Revision level. A change in the major revision level represents a major change in the architecture of the MIB. A change in the major revision level may indicate a significant change in the information, correct interpretation of data may require a MIB document with the same major revision level.

cmcTcMibMinRev.name: cmcTcMibMinRev
cmcTcMibMinRev.description: The Minor Revision level. A change in the minor revision level may represent some minor additional support, no changes to any pre-existing information has occurred.

cmcTcMibCondition.name: cmcTcMibCondition
cmcTcMibCondition.description: The overall condition (status) of the system represented by this MIB. (2) OK (3) a minor problem, warning condition (yellow LED on CMC) (4) a major problem (red LED on CMC) (5) configuration of sensor units changed or unit detected (red/yellow/green LED on CMC)

cmcTcStatusDeviceCMC.name: cmcTcStatusDeviceCMC
cmcTcStatusDeviceCMC.description: General Status of CMC-TC unit itself (1) failed (2) OK

cmcTcUnitsConnected.name: cmcTcUnitsConnected
cmcTcUnitsConnected.description: Number of sensor units connected to the CMC, Port 1 to 4

cmcTcUnit1TypeOfDevice.name: cmcTcUnit1TypeOfDevice
cmcTcUnit1TypeOfDevice.description: Type of sensor unit connected to port 1

cmcTcUnit1Text.name: cmcTcUnit1Text
cmcTcUnit1Text.description: Descriptional text for sensor unit connected to port 1

cmcTcUnit1Serial.name: cmcTcUnit1Serial
cmcTcUnit1Serial.description: Serialnumber of sensor unit connected to port 1

cmcTcUnit1Status.name: cmcTcUnit1Status
cmcTcUnit1Status.description: General Status sensor unit connected to port 1 (1) OK (2) error, e. g. value overflow (3) configuration of sensor unit has changed, confirmation required (4) Quit from sensor unit to confirm configuration changes (5) timeout of sensor unit, confirmation required to unload this unit (6) sensor unit detected, needs to be confirmed (7) unit is not available (8) supply voltage is too low (9) Firmware upgrade running

cmcTcUnit1NumberOfSensors.name: cmcTcUnit1NumberOfSensors
cmcTcUnit1NumberOfSensors.description: Number of sensors connected to sensor unit 1

unit1SensorIndex.name: unit1SensorIndex
unit1SensorIndex.description: Index for the list of value entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcUnit1NumberOfSensors.

unit1SensorType.name: unit1SensorType
unit1SensorType.description: Type of sensor which is connected to sensor unit 1 to sensor[unit1SensorIndex] 1: no sensor connected 2: sensor failure 3: value overflow 4: sensor type 1, access sensor 5: sensor type 2, vibration sensor 6: sensor type 3, motion sensor 7: sensor type 4, smoke sensor 8: sensor type 5, air flow sensor 9: sensor type 6, reserved 10: sensor type 7, temperature sensor 11: sensor type 8, 4..20mA sensor 12: sensor type 9, humidity sensor 13: user sensor with normally opened contact 14: user sensor with normally closed contact 15: door locked sensor from locking device 16: remote unlock sensor (e.g. external keypad) 17: voltage sensor, indicates status of main voltage (OK, NOK) 18: voltage value 19: fan status, from CMC-TC-FAS-Unit 20: cardreader or keypad, connected to I2C port 21: duty cycle of fan, FCS-Unit 22: status of fan, FCS-Unit 23: leakage sensor 24: warning, RittalTopTherm(RTT)-Unit 25: alarm, RittalTopTherm-Unit 26: temperature difference filter monitor, RTT-Unit 27: heatflow RCT-Unit 28: alarm RCT-Unit 29: warning RCT-Unit 30: actual current*10, PSM-Unit 31: status PSM-Unit 32: position PSM-Unit, normal/reversed = circuit 1/2 33: air Flap 34: acoustic sensor 35: DET-AC fault (extinguisher) 36: DET-AC first alarm (extinguisher) 37: DET-AC main alarm (extinguisher) 38: DRC: RFID Tag 40-47: RPM Fan 1.1 - Fan 4.2, LCP 48-55: Air temperature 1.1 - 4.2, LCP 56,57: actual temperature 1,2, LCP 58: water inlet temperature, LCP 59: water outlet temperature, LCP 60: water flow 61: fan speed (desired value) 62: status valve, LCP 63: status LCP 64: temperature difference water temperatures 65: control temperature 1, LCP 66: control temperature 2, LCP 67: condensate pump, duration, LCP 68: condensate pump, cycles, LCP 72: total energy*10 (kWh), PSM 73: total power*10 (kW), PSM 74: frequency*10 (Hz), PSM 75: voltage*10 (V), PSM 76: voltage status, PSM 77: current*10 (A), PSM 78: current status, PSM 79: power*10 (kW) per phase, PSM 80: energy*10 (kWh) per phase, PSM 81: temporary energy*10 (kWh) per phase, PSM 100: temperature sensor, wireless 101: temperature sensor (combi), wireless 102: humidity sensor, wireless 103: access sensor, wireless 104: user sensor with normally opened contact, wireless 105: user sensor with normally closed contact, wireless 106: analog sensor 4..20mA, wireless

unit1SensorText.name: unit1SensorText
unit1SensorText.description: Descriptional text for each sensor (entry in the table)

unit1SensorSetHigh.name: unit1SensorSetHigh
unit1SensorSetHigh.description: Value for high setpoint of sensor

unit1SensorSetLow.name: unit1SensorSetLow
unit1SensorSetLow.description: Value for low setpoint of sensor, also used as alarm delay

unit1SensorSetWarn.name: unit1SensorSetWarn
unit1SensorSetWarn.description: Value for warning setpoint of sensor, also used as fan threshold

unit1SensorHysteresis.name: unit1SensorHysteresis
unit1SensorHysteresis.description: % -Value for hysteresis for High, Low and Warning, input in % from actual setpoint

unit1SensorDisplayFactor.name: unit1SensorDisplayFactor
unit1SensorDisplayFactor.description: Factor of sensor value and setpoints, devide actual value with this value, e. g. factor = 10: sensor value = 100, actual value = 10.0

unit1SensorScaleStart.name: unit1SensorScaleStart
unit1SensorScaleStart.description: Value for start value for scaling of 0..100% (4..20mA) sensor, example: acutal range of value of 4..20mA sensor is from 10 to 60A, then this variable is set to 10, also valid for setpoints

unit1SensorScaleEnd.name: unit1SensorScaleEnd
unit1SensorScaleEnd.description: Value for end value for scaling of 0..100% (4..20mA) sensor, example: acutal range of value of 4..20mA sensor is from 10 to 60A, then this variable is set to 60, also valid for setpoints

unit1SensorUnit.name: unit1SensorUnit
unit1SensorUnit.description: Unit for 0..100% (4..20mA) sensor, example: acutal range of value of 4..20mA sensor is from 10 to 60A, then this variable is set to 'A'

unit1SensorInfo.name: unit1SensorInfo
unit1SensorInfo.description: Additional information to the sensor, e. g. Serialnumber, Signal Quality..

cmcTcUnit1NumberOfOutputs.name: cmcTcUnit1NumberOfOutputs
cmcTcUnit1NumberOfOutputs.description: Number of outputs available on sensor unit 1

unit1OutputIndex.name: unit1OutputIndex
unit1OutputIndex.description: Index for the list of output entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcUnit1NumberOfOutputs.

unit1OutputType.name: unit1OutputType
unit1OutputType.description: Type of output which is connected to sensor unit 1 to output[unit1OutputIndex] 1: no output connected 2: output failure 3: value overflow 4: output type 1, door locking TS8,Ergoform 5: output type 2, universal lock 1, lock with power 6: output type 3, universal lock 2, unlock with power 7: output type 4, fan relay 8: output type 5, fan controlled 9: output type 6, universal relay output 10: output type 7, room door lock 11: output type 8, power output 12: output type 9, door lock with Master key 13: output type 10, door lock FR(i) 14: setpoint (FCS, LCP) 15: setpoint temperature monitoring (LCP) 16: hysteresis of setpoint (LCP) 17: command for remote control of RCT 18: relay PSM, 1=On, 0=Off 19: high setpoint current monitoring PSM 20: low setpoint current monitoring PSM 21: setpoint temperature RTT 22: setpoint temperature monitoring RTT 23: power output 20A 24: door magnet (automatic door release) 30: control mode, LCP 31: min fan speed (fan control), LCP 32: min delta T (fan control), LCP 33: max delta T (fan control), LCP 34: PID controller, KP, LCP 35: PID controller, KI, LCP 36 PID controller, KD, LCP 37 flowrate flowmeter, LCP 38: cw value of water (default: 4187), LCP 39: deltaT, LCP 40: control mode, LCP 42: setpoint high voltage PSM 43: setpoint low voltage PSM 44: setpoint high current PSM 45: setpoint low current PSM 46: command PSM

unit1OutputText.name: unit1OutputText
unit1OutputText.description: Descriptional text for each output (entry in the table)

unit1OutputConfig.name: unit1OutputConfig
unit1OutputConfig.description: Configuration for output 1: disable remote control (e.g. keypad) 2: enable remote control

unit1OutputDelay.name: unit1OutputDelay
unit1OutputDelay.description: Unsigned Value for delay, after this time the output will fall into the previous state

unit1OutputTimeoutAction.name: unit1OutputTimeoutAction
unit1OutputTimeoutAction.description: State for output if timeout (RS422) occurs

cmcTcUnit1NumberOfMsgs.name: cmcTcUnit1NumberOfMsgs
cmcTcUnit1NumberOfMsgs.description: Number of messages that can be created with sensor unit 1

unit1MsgIndex.name: unit1MsgIndex
unit1MsgIndex.description: Index for the list of message entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcUnit1NumberOfMsgs.

unit1MsgText.name: unit1MsgText
unit1MsgText.description: Descriptional text for each message (entry in the table)

unit1MsgStatus.name: unit1MsgStatus
unit1MsgStatus.description: Actual message status 1: not available 2: configuration has changed (sensor new, changed, lost) 3: error 4: OK 5: alarm, e.g. smoke, vibration... 6: warning of analog value, value reached warning threshold 7: analog value too low, value reached low threshold 8: analog value too high, value reached high threshold 9: output is set to OFF 10: output is set to ON 11: door is open 12: door is closed 13: door is locked 14: door is unlocked by remote input, e.g. external cardreader 15: door is unlocked by reader or keypad connected to I2C 16: door is unlocked by SNMP set command (unit1OutputSet) 17: door is unlocked by WEB 18: door is unlocked by timer 19: no access, wrong keycode or cardnumber 20: orientation of PSM-Unit is circuit 1 21: orientation of PSM-Unit is circuit 2 22: battery low, wireless sensor

unit1MsgRelay.name: unit1MsgRelay
unit1MsgRelay.description: Setup of Alarm relay for this message/alarm 1: no switching of alarm relay 2: switching of alarm relay

unit1MsgBeeper.name: unit1MsgBeeper
unit1MsgBeeper.description: Setup of Alarm beeper for this alarm 1: no audible alarm 2: audible alarm

unit1MsgTrap4.name: unit1MsgTrap4
unit1MsgTrap4.description: Trap receiver 4 and Event Logging activated

unit1MsgQuit.name: unit1MsgQuit
unit1MsgQuit.description: Reset of this alarm 1: auto 2: manual, alarm needs confirmation, e. g. with 'C' key

cmcTcUnit2TypeOfDevice.name: cmcTcUnit2TypeOfDevice
cmcTcUnit2TypeOfDevice.description: Type of sensor unit connected to port 2

cmcTcUnit2Text.name: cmcTcUnit2Text
cmcTcUnit2Text.description: Descriptional text for sensor unit connected to port 2

cmcTcUnit2Serial.name: cmcTcUnit2Serial
cmcTcUnit2Serial.description: Serialnumber of sensor unit connected to port 2

cmcTcUnit2Status.name: cmcTcUnit2Status
cmcTcUnit2Status.description: General Status sensor unit connected to port 2 (1) OK (2) error (3) configuration of sensor unit has changed, confirmation required (4) Quit from sensor unit to confirm configuration changes (5) timeout of sensor unit, confirmation required (6) sensor unit detected, needs to be confirmed (8) supply voltage is too low (9) Firmware upgrade running

cmcTcUnit2NumberOfSensors.description: Number of sensors connected to sensor unit 2

unit2SensorIndex.name: unit2SensorIndex
unit2SensorIndex.description: Index for the list of value entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcUnit2NumberOfSensors.

unit2SensorType.description: Type of sensor which is connected to sensor unit 2 to sensor[unit2SensorIndex] 1: no sensor connected 2: sensor failure 3: value overflow 4: sensor type 1, access sensor 5: sensor type 2, vibration sensor 6: sensor type 3, motion sensor 7: sensor type 4, smoke sensor 8: sensor type 5, air flow sensor 9: sensor type 6, reserved 10: sensor type 7, temperature sensor 11: sensor type 8, 4..20mA sensor 12: sensor type 9, humidity sensor 13: user sensor with normally opened contact 14: user sensor with normally closed contact 15: door locked sensor from locking device 16: remote unlock sensor (e.g. external keypad) 17: voltage sensor, indicates status of main voltage 18: voltage value 19: fan status 20: cardreader or keypad, connected to I2C port 21: duty cycle of fan, FCS-Unit 22: status of fan, FCS-Unit 23: leakage sensor 24: warning, RittalTopTherm(RTT)-Unit 25: alarm, RittalTopTherm-Unit 26: temperature difference filter monitor, RTT-Unit 27: heatflow RCT-Unit 28: alarm RCT-Unit 29: warning RCT-Unit 30: actual current*10, PSM-Unit 31: status PSM-Unit 32: position PSM-Unit, normal/reversed = circuit 1/2 33: air Flap 34: acoustic sensor 35: DET-AC fault (extinguisher) 36: DET-AC first alarm (extinguisher) 37: DET-AC main alarm (extinguisher) 38: DRC: RFID Tag 40-47: RPM Fan 1.1 - Fan 4.2, LCP 48-55: Air temperature 1.1 - 4.2, LCP 56,57: actual temperature 1,2, LCP 58: water inlet temperature, LCP 59: water outlet temperature, LCP 60: water flow 61: fan speed (desired value) 62: status valve, LCP 63: status LCP 64: temperature difference water temperatures 65: control temperature 1, LCP 66: control temperature 2, LCP 67: condensate pump, duration, LCP 68: condensate pump, cycles, LCP 72: total energy*10 (kWh), PSM 73: total power*10 (kW), PSM 74: frequency*10 (Hz), PSM 75: voltage*10 (V), PSM 76: voltage status, PSM 77: current*10 (A), PSM 78: current status, PSM 79: power*10 (kW) per phase, PSM 80: energy*10 (kWh) per phase, PSM 81: temporary energy*10 (kWh) per phase, PSM 100: temperature sensor, wireless 101: temperature sensor (combi), wireless 102: humidity sensor, wireless 103: access sensor, wireless 104: user sensor with normally opened contact, wireless 105: user sensor with normally closed contact, wireless 106: analog sensor 4..20mA, wireless

unit2OutputIndex.description: Index for the list of output entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcUnit2NumberOfOutputs.

unit2OutputType.description: Type of output which is connected to sensor unit 2 to output[unit2OutputIndex] 1: no output connected 2: output failure 3: value overflow 4: output type 1, door locking TS8,Ergoform 5: output type 2, universal lock 1, lock with power 6: output type 3, universal lock 2, unlock with power 7: output type 4, fan relay 8: output type 5, fan controlled 9: output type 6, universal relay output 10: output type 7, room door lock 11: output type 8, power output 12: output type 9, door lock with Master key 13: output type 10, door lock FR(i) 14: setpoint (FCS, RTT) 15: setpoint temperature monitoring (RTT) 16: hysteresis of setpoint (RCT) 17: command for remote control of RCT 18: relay PSM, 1=On, 0=Off 19: high setpoint current monitoring PSM 20: low setpoint current monitoring PSM 21: setpoint temperature RTT 22: setpoint temperature monitoring RTT 23: power output 20A 24: door magnet (automatic door release) 30: control mode LCP 31: min fan speed (fan control) LCP 32: min delta T (fan control) LCP 33: max delta T (fan control) LCP 34: PID controller, KP, LCP 35: PID controller, KI, LCP 36 PID controller, KD, LCP 37 flowrate flowmeter, LCP 38: cw value of water (default: 4187) LCP 39: deltaT, LCP 40: control mode, LCP 42: setpoint high voltage PSM 43: setpoint low voltage PSM 44: setpoint high current PSM 45: setpoint low current PSM 46: command PSM

unit2MsgStatus.name: unit2MsgStatus
unit2MsgStatus.description: Actual message status 1: not available 2: configuration has changed (sensor new, changed, lost) 3: error 4: OK 5: alarm, e.g. smoke, vibration... 6: warning of analog value, value reached warning threshold 7: analog value too low, value reached low threshold 8: analog value too high, value reached high threshold 9: output is set to OFF 10: output is set to ON 11: door is open 12: door is closed 13: door is locked 14: door is unlocked by remote input, e.g. external cardreader 15: door is unlocked by reader or keypad connected to I2C 16: door is unlocked by SNMP set command (unit1OutputSet) 17: door is unlocked by WEB 18: door is unlocked by timer 19: no access, wrong keycode or cardnumber 20: orientation of PSM-Unit is circuit 1 21: orientation of PSM-Unit is circuit 2 22: battery low, wireless sensor

unit2MsgRelay.name: unit2MsgRelay
unit2MsgRelay.description: Setup of Alarm relay for this alarm 2: no switching of alarm relay 1: switching of alarm relay

unit2MsgBeeper.name: unit2MsgBeeper
unit2MsgBeeper.description: Setup of Alarm beeper for this alarm 2: no audible alarm 1: audible alarm

unit2MsgTrap4.name: unit2MsgTrap4

unit3MsgStatus.name: unit3MsgStatus
unit3MsgStatus.description: Actual message status 1: not available 2: configuration has changed (sensor new, changed, lost) 3: error 4: OK 5: alarm, e.g. smoke, vibration... 6: warning of analog value, value reached warning threshold 7: analog value too low, value reached low threshold 8: analog value too high, value reached high threshold 9: output is set to OFF 10: output is set to ON 11: door is open 12: door is closed 13: door is locked 14: door is unlocked by remote input, e.g. external cardreader 15: door is unlocked by reader or keypad connected to I2C 16: door is unlocked by SNMP set command (unit1OutputSet) 17: door is unlocked by WEB 18: door is unlocked by timer 19: no access, wrong keycode or cardnumber 20: orientation of PSM-Unit is circuit 1 21: orientation of PSM-Unit is circuit 2 22: battery low, wireless sensor

unit3MsgRelay.name: unit3MsgRelay
unit3MsgRelay.description: Setup of Alarm relay for this alarm 1: no switching of alarm relay 2: switching of alarm relay

unit3MsgBeeper.name: unit3MsgBeeper
unit3MsgBeeper.description: Setup of Alarm beeper for this alarm 1: no audible alarm 2: audible alarm

unit3MsgTrap4.name: unit3MsgTrap4
unit3MsgTrap4.description: Trap receiver 4 and Event Logging activated

unit3MsgQuit.name: unit3MsgQuit
unit3MsgQuit.description: Reset of this alarm 1: auto 2: manual, alarm needs confirmation, e. g. with 'C' key

cmcTcUnit4TypeOfDevice.name: cmcTcUnit4TypeOfDevice
cmcTcUnit4TypeOfDevice.description: Type of sensor unit connected to port 4

cmcTcUnit4Text.name: cmcTcUnit4Text
cmcTcUnit4Text.description: Descriptional text for sensor unit connected to port 4

cmcTcUnit4Serial.name: cmcTcUnit4Serial
cmcTcUnit4Serial.description: Serialnumber of sensor unit connected to port 4

cmcTcUnit4Status.name: cmcTcUnit4Status
cmcTcUnit4Status.description: General Status sensor unit connected to port 4 (1) OK (2) error, e. g. value overflow (3) configuration of sensor unit has changed, confirmation required (4) Quit from sensor unit to confirm configuration changes (5) timeout of sensor unit, confirmation required to unload this unit (6) sensor unit detected, needs to be confirmed (7) unit is not available (8) supply voltage is too low (9) Firmware upgrade running

cmcTcUnit4NumberOfSensors.name: cmcTcUnit4NumberOfSensors
cmcTcUnit4NumberOfSensors.description: Number of sensors connected to sensor unit 4

unit4SensorIndex.name: unit4SensorIndex
unit4SensorIndex.description: Index for the list of value entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcUnit4NumberOfSensors.

unit4SensorType.name: unit4SensorType
unit4SensorType.description: Type of sensor which is connected to sensor unit 4 to sensor[unit4SensorIndex] 1: no sensor connected 2: sensor failure 3: value overflow 4: sensor type 1, access sensor 5: sensor type 2, vibration sensor 6: sensor type 3, motion sensor 7: sensor type 4, smoke sensor 8: sensor type 5, air flow sensor 9: sensor type 6, reserved 10: sensor type 7, temperature sensor 11: sensor type 8, 4..20mA sensor 12: sensor type 9, humidity sensor 13: user sensor with normally opened contact 14: user sensor with normally closed contact 15: door locked sensor from locking device 16: remote unlock sensor (e.g. external keypad) 17: voltage sensor, indicates status of main voltage 18: voltage value 19: fan status 20: cardreader or keypad, connected to I2C port 21: duty cycle of fan, FCS-Unit 22: status of fan, FCS-Unit 23: leakage sensor 24: warning, RittalTopTherm(RTT)-Unit 25: alarm, RittalTopTherm-Unit 26: temperature difference filter monitor, RTT-Unit 27: heatflow RCT-Unit 28: alarm RCT-Unit 29: warning RCT-Unit 30: actual current*10, PSM-Unit 31: status PSM-Unit 32: position PSM-Unit, normal/reversed = circuit 1/2 33: air Flap 34: acoustic sensor 35: DET-AC fault (extinguisher) 36: DET-AC first alarm (extinguisher) 37: DET-AC main alarm (extinguisher) 38: DRC: RFID Tag 40-47: RPM Fan 1.1 - Fan 4.2, LCP 48-55: Air temperature 1.1 - 4.2, LCP 56,57: actual temperature 1,2, LCP 58: water inlet temperature, LCP 59: water outlet temperature, LCP 60: water flow 61: fan speed (desired value) 62: status valve, LCP 63: status LCP 64: temperature difference water temperatures 65: control temperature 1, LCP 66: control temperature 2, LCP 67: condensate pump, duration, LCP 68: condensate pump, cycles, LCP 72: total energy*10 (kWh), PSM 73: total power*10 (kW), PSM 74: frequency*10 (Hz), PSM 75: voltage*10 (V), PSM 76: voltage status, PSM 77: current*10 (A), PSM 78: current status, PSM 79: power*10 (kW) per phase, PSM 80: energy*10 (kWh) per phase, PSM 81: temporary energy*10 (kWh) per phase, PSM 100: temperature sensor, wireless 101: temperature sensor (combi), wireless 102: humidity sensor, wireless 103: access sensor, wireless 104: user sensor with normally opened contact, wireless 105: user sensor with normally closed contact, wireless 106: analog sensor 4..20mA, wireless

unit4SensorText.name: unit4SensorText
unit4SensorText.description: Descriptional text for each sensor (entry in the table)

unit4SensorSetHigh.name: unit4SensorSetHigh
unit4SensorSetHigh.description: Value for high setpoint of sensor

unit4SensorSetLow.name: unit4SensorSetLow
unit4SensorSetLow.description: Value for low setpoint of sensor

unit4SensorSetWarn.name: unit4SensorSetWarn
unit4SensorSetWarn.description: Value for warning setpoint of sensor, also used as fan threshold

unit4SensorHysteresis.name: unit4SensorHysteresis
unit4SensorHysteresis.description: % -Value for hysteresis for High, Low and Warning, input in % from actual setpoint

unit4SensorDisplayFactor.name: unit4SensorDisplayFactor
unit4SensorDisplayFactor.description: Factor of sensor value and setpoints, devide actual value with this value, e. g. factor = 10: sensor value = 100, actual value = 10.0

unit4SensorScaleStart.name: unit4SensorScaleStart
unit4SensorScaleStart.description: Value for start value for scaling of 0..100% (4..20mA) sensor, example: acutal range of value of 4..20mA sensor is from 10 to 60A, then this variable is set to 10, also valid for setpoints

unit4SensorScaleEnd.name: unit4SensorScaleEnd
unit4SensorScaleEnd.description: Value for end value for scaling of 0..100% (4..20mA) sensor, example: acutal range of value of 4..20mA sensor is from 10 to 60A, then this variable is set to 60, also valid for setpoints

unit4SensorUnit.name: unit4SensorUnit
unit4SensorUnit.description: Unit for 0..100% (4..20mA) sensor, example: acutal range of value of 4..20mA sensor is from 10 to 60A, then this variable is set to 'A'

unit4SensorInfo.name: unit4SensorInfo
unit4SensorInfo.description: Additional information to the sensor, e. g. Serialnumber, Signal Quality..

cmcTcUnit4NumberOfOutputs.name: cmcTcUnit4NumberOfOutputs
cmcTcUnit4NumberOfOutputs.description: Number of outputs available on sensor unit 4

unit4OutputIndex.name: unit4OutputIndex
unit4OutputIndex.description: Index for the list of output entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcUnit4NumberOfOutputs.

unit4OutputType.name: unit4OutputType
unit4OutputType.description: Type of output which is connected to sensor unit 4 to output[unit4OutputIndex] 1: no output connected 2: output failure 3: value overflow 4: output type 1, door locking TS8,Ergoform 5: output type 2, universal lock 1, lock with power 6: output type 3, universal lock 2, unlock with power 7: output type 4, fan relay 8: output type 5, fan controlled 9: output type 6, universal relay output 10: output type 7, room door lock 11: output type 8, power output 12: output type 9, door lock with Master key 13: output type 10, door lock FR(i) 14: setpoint (FCS, RTT) 15: setpoint temperature monitoring (RTT) 16: hysteresis of setpoint (RCT) 17: command for remote control of RCT 18: relay PSM, 1=On, 0=Off 19: high setpoint current monitoring PSM 20: low setpoint current monitoring PSM 21: setpoint temperature RTT 22: setpoint temperature monitoring RTT 23: power output 20A 24: door magnet (automatic door release) 30: control mode LCP 31: min fan speed (fan control) LCP 32: min delta T (fan control) LCP 33: max delta T (fan control) LCP 34: PID controller, KP, LCP 35: PID controller, KI, LCP 36 PID controller, KD, LCP 37 flowrate flowmeter, LCP 38: cw value of water (default: 4187) LCP 39: deltaT, LCP 40: control mode, LCP 42: setpoint high voltage PSM 43: setpoint low voltage PSM 44: setpoint high current PSM 45: setpoint low current PSM 46: command PSM

unit4OutputText.name: unit4OutputText
unit4OutputText.description: Descriptional text for each output (entry in the table)

unit4OutputConfig.name: unit4OutputConfig
unit4OutputConfig.description: Configuration for output 1: disable remote control (e.g. keypad) 2: enable remote control

unit4OutputDelay.name: unit4OutputDelay
unit4OutputDelay.description: Unsigned Value for delay, after this time the output will fall into the previous state

unit4OutputTimeoutAction.name: unit4OutputTimeoutAction
unit4OutputTimeoutAction.description: State for output if timeout (RS422) occurs

cmcTcUnit4NumberOfMsgs.name: cmcTcUnit4NumberOfMsgs
cmcTcUnit4NumberOfMsgs.description: Number of alarms that can be created with sensor unit 4

unit4MsgIndex.name: unit4MsgIndex
unit4MsgIndex.description: Index for the list of alarm entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcUnit4NumberOfMsgs.

unit4MsgText.name: unit4MsgText
unit4MsgText.description: Descriptional text for each message (entry in the table)

unit4MsgStatus.name: unit4MsgStatus
unit4MsgStatus.description: Actual message status 1: not available 2: configuration has changed (sensor new, changed, lost) 3: error 4: OK 5: alarm, e.g. smoke, vibration... 6: warning of analog value, value reached warning threshold 7: analog value too low, value reached low threshold 8: analog value too high, value reached high threshold 9: output is set to OFF 10: output is set to ON 11: door is open 12: door is closed 13: door is locked 14: door is unlocked by remote input, e.g. external cardreader 15: door is unlocked by reader or keypad connected to I2C 16: door is unlocked by SNMP set command (unit1OutputSet) 17: door is unlocked by WEB 18: door is unlocked by timer 19: no access, wrong keycode or cardnumber 20: orientation of PSM-Unit is circuit 1 21: orientation of PSM-Unit is circuit 2 22: battery low, wireless sensor

unit4MsgRelay.name: unit4MsgRelay
unit4MsgRelay.description: Setup of Alarm relay for this alarm 1: no switching of alarm relay 2: switching of alarm relay

unit4MsgBeeper.name: unit4MsgBeeper
unit4MsgBeeper.description: Setup of Alarm beeper for this alarm 1: no audible alarm 2: audible alarm

unit4MsgTrap4.name: unit4MsgTrap4
unit4MsgTrap4.description: Trap receiver 4 and Event Logging activated

unit4MsgQuit.name: unit4MsgQuit
unit4MsgQuit.description: Reset of this alarm 1: auto 2: manual, alarm needs confirmation, e. g. with 'C' key

cmcTcValuesRelay.name: cmcTcValuesRelay
cmcTcValuesRelay.description: Setup of Alarm relay for alarm ext. unit(s) 1: no switching of alarm relay 2: switching of alarm relay

cmcTcValuesBeeper.name: cmcTcValuesBeeper
cmcTcValuesBeeper.description: Setup of Alarm beeper for alarm ext. unit(s) 1: no audible alarm 2: audible alarm

cmcTcValuesTrap4.name: cmcTcValuesTrap4
cmcTcValuesTrap4.description: Trap receiver 4 and Event Logging activated

cmcTcNumberOfValues.name: cmcTcNumberOfValues
cmcTcNumberOfValues.description: Number of values availabel on extension units connected to the CMC

valuesIndex.name: valuesIndex
valuesIndex.description: Index for the list of value entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcNumberOfValues.

valuesText.name: valuesText
valuesText.description: Descriptional text for each value (entry in the table) of the extension card

valuesStatus.name: valuesStatus
valuesStatus.description: Actual status of the value of the extension card

valuesSetHigh.name: valuesSetHigh
valuesSetHigh.description: Value for high setpoint of sensor

valuesSetLow.name: valuesSetLow
valuesSetLow.description: Value for low setpoint of sensor

valuesHysteresis.name: valuesHysteresis
valuesHysteresis.description: % -Value for hysteresis for High and Low setpoints, input in % from actual setpoint

cmcTcSetTempUnit.name: cmcTcSetTempUnit
cmcTcSetTempUnit.description: Unit of all temperature values and setpoints, Celsius or Fahrenheit

cmcTcSetBeeper.name: cmcTcSetBeeper
cmcTcSetBeeper.description: Audible alarm in CMC-TC unit: (2): beeper is on (1): beeper is off (general)

cmcTcQuitRelay.name: cmcTcQuitRelay
cmcTcQuitRelay.description: Enable or disable acknowledging currently active alarm relay (with 'C' on CMC-TC).

cmcTcLogicRelay.name: cmcTcLogicRelay
cmcTcLogicRelay.description: Logic of alarm relay: (1) Relay will pick up in case of an alarm (2) Relay will release in case of an alarm (3) Relay off (general)

cmcTcWebAccess.name: cmcTcWebAccess
cmcTcWebAccess.description: Web access via HTTP: (1) view only (2) full Access, read and set (3) Web disabled (general)

cmcTcSetupTime.name: cmcTcSetupTime
cmcTcSetupTime.description: actual Time in format HH:MM:SS, HH (0-23), MM (0-59), SS (0-59)

cmcTcTimerNumber.name: cmcTcTimerNumber
cmcTcTimerNumber.description: Number of value-table entries=number of outlets available on this unit

cmcTcTimerIndex.name: cmcTcTimerIndex
cmcTcTimerIndex.description: Index for the list of timer entries. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of cmcTcTimerNumber.

cmcTcTimerDayOfWeek.name: cmcTcTimerDayOfWeek
cmcTcTimerDayOfWeek.description: Selection of day of week for timer to switch

cmcTcTimeOn.name: cmcTcTimeOn
cmcTcTimeOn.description: Time to switch on current function, Format: HH:MM

cmcTcTimeOff.name: cmcTcTimeOff
cmcTcTimeOff.description: Time to switch off current function, Format: HH:MM

cmcTcTimerFunction.name: cmcTcTimerFunction
cmcTcTimerFunction.description: Function which is controlled via timer 1: unlock via keypad 1 on unit 1 or remote input lock 1 is disabled 2: unlock via keypad 2 on unit 1 or remote input lock 2 is disabled 3 unlock via keypad 1 on unit 2 or remote input lock 1 is disabled 4: unlock via keypad 2 on unit 2 or remote input lock 2 is disabled 5: unlock via keypad 1 on unit 3 or remote input lock 1 is disabled 6: unlock via keypad 2 on unit 3 or remote input lock 2 is disabled 7: unlock via keypad 1 on unit 4 or remote input lock 1 is disabled 8: unlock via keypad 2 on unit 4 or remote input lock 2 is disabled 9: Lock of door 1 on unit 1 will be unlocked 10: Lock of door 2 on unit 1 will be unlocked 11: Lock of door 1 on unit 2 will be unlocked 12: Lock of door 2 on unit 2 will be unlocked 13: Lock of door 1 on unit 3 will be unlocked 14: Lock of door 2 on unit 3 will be unlocked 15: Lock of door 1 on unit 4 will be unlocked 16: Lock of door 2 on unit 4 will be unlocked 17-20: sending Traps to this Trap receiver will be disabled 21: sending SMS will be disabled generally 22-25: Scheduled alarm off 26-29: sending SMS to phone number 1..4 will be disabled

cmcTcTraptableNumber.name: cmcTcTraptableNumber
cmcTcTraptableNumber.description: Number of trapTable entries. The number of trap-receiver

trapIndex.name: trapIndex
trapIndex.description: Index for the trap-receiver-table. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of traptableNumber

cmcTcQuitUnit.name: cmcTcQuitUnit
cmcTcQuitUnit.description: Command to quit (acknowledge) alarms of CMC-TC unit. Setting to 'quit' (2) will have same result as pressing 'C' on Units. Variable is automatically set back to 'noQuit' (1).

alarmValues.name: alarmValues
alarmValues.description: Alarm of values measured by external card

configChanged.name: configChanged
configChanged.description: The configuration of the cmc has changed, this trap is send if new setup is saved. Configuration can be changed by Terminal, Telnet, Web or SNMP *** NOT IMPLEMENTED ***
